#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int minSprays(int n,int k,string s)
{
   int i,count=1,ans=0,flag=0;
   for(i=0;i<s.size()-1;i++)
   {
       if(s[i]==s[i+1]) count++;
       else
       {
           if(count>=k) flag=1;
           ans+=(int)ceil((float)count/(float)k);
           count=1;
       }
   }
   if(count>=k) flag=1;
   ans+=(int)ceil((float)count/(float)k);

   if(!flag) return -1;
   else return ans;
}
main()
{
    int tc,n,k;
    string s;
    cin>>tc;
    while(tc--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        cin>>s;
        cout<<minSprays(n,k,s)<<"\n";
    }
}
